mapper.insert: insert into ecs_supplier_rebate (rebate_id, rebate_paytime_start, rebate_paytime_end, supplier_id, is_pay_ok, pay_type, pay_time, remark, admin_user, rebate_all, rebate_money, payable_price, rebate_img, status ) values (#{rebate_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rebate_paytime_start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rebate_paytime_end,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_pay_ok,jdbcType=BIT}, #{pay_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pay_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admin_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rebate_all,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rebate_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payable_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rebate_img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.update: update ecs_supplier_rebate set rebate_paytime_start = #{rebate_paytime_start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rebate_paytime_end = #{rebate_paytime_end,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_pay_ok = #{is_pay_ok,jdbcType=BIT}, pay_type = #{pay_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_time = #{pay_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_user = #{admin_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rebate_all = #{rebate_all,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rebate_money = #{rebate_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payable_price = #{payable_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rebate_img = #{rebate_img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where rebate_id = #{rebate_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select rebate_id, rebate_paytime_start, rebate_paytime_end, supplier_id, is_pay_ok, pay_type, pay_time, remark, admin_user, rebate_all, rebate_money, payable_price, rebate_img, status from ecs_supplier_rebate where rebate_id = #{rebate_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
